Library.author: Bookworm
Library.text: So quiet and peaceful. I go there to get away from the hostel noise.

Library.author: A Student
Library.text: The library is the best spot for focused study. Always quiet!

Library.author: Reader
Library.text: Great collection of books, both academic and fiction.

Maggi.author: Hostelite
Maggi.text: The Maggi at Square 1 is a classic. Can't beat it. A must-have.

Maggi.author: SnackLover
Maggi.text: My go-to comfort food on campus.

Alpha Zone.author: Shutterbug
Alpha Zone.text: Best place for photos, especially in the evening light.
